CPC-specific-text.text: Caps or soft head coverings with means for protecting the eyes; Uniform caps
Peaks; Visors
with stiffening means
detachable or movable, e.g. rotatable
extensible or telescopic
Caps or soft head coverings with means for protecting the ears or nape of neck; Caps with flaps; Motoring caps
with removable protection of the nape of neck, e.g. sun or rain shields
with additional protection for the ears; Removable ear muffs
Linings

title-part.text: with coverings for protecting against dust, rain, or sunshine

Inflatable hats
Hats made of separable parts
Transformable, convertible, reversible hats

Form-fitting or self adjusting head coverings; Devices for reducing hat size

Rear view devices or the like

with reinforcing means
using layered structures
with relative movement between layers
Corrugated or ribbed shells
specially adapted for cycling helmets, e.g. for soft shelled helmets
with damage indication means
with preferential fracture zones
with soft external layer, e.g. for use in impact sports

inflatable
with at least one corrugated or ribbed layer

with zones of different density

CPC-specific-text.text: Chin protectors
Attaching visors to helmet shells, e.g. on motorcycle helmets
in an articulated manner, e.g. hinge devices
with means for locking the visor in a fully open, intermediate or closed position
with electrical actuation means
with full face protection, e.g. for industrial safety applications
with sunscreens, e.g. tinted or dual visor
with sun visors, e.g. peaks above face opening
for military or aviation applications

Movable or interchangeable vision films or sheets
